items.excuse: I love my dog. Just not all animals.
Save the whales. Eat a pig.
It's my personal choice to eat meat. Even if the animal doesn't have a choice to live.
I could never harm an animal myself. So I pay someone else to do the killing for me.
I love saying 'bacon', rather than 'dead pig'. It sounds better in my head.
I just love the taste of dead animal flesh and cow's breast milk.
But I need meat for protein. #Gains.

Because I feel better if I buy free-range eggs, and organic, grass-fed beef. Even though the chickens and cows are still slaughtered 'humanely'. Deep down, I know there's no such thing as a humane killing.
I'm too apathetic to change the way I eat.
I KNOW that animal agriculture is the biggest contributor to climate change, species extinction and ocean depletion. But #yolo. Meat rocks.
Because milk in my coffee is delicious - even if female cows were raped in the process. Yum!
Ice cream is the best. I never hear the cows scream.
Wait. I didn't know other animals had feelings? I thought it was only my dog.
Do animals even feel pain?
But...cheese! Cheese is way more important to me than cruelty to a cow.
I couldn't give up yoghurt - even if it is filled with pus and hormones from a cow.
'Lamb' is easier to digest than 'dead sheep flesh'.
I like eggs. Even if they are chicken periods and chickens are force-fed and slaughtered just so I can enjoy my bacon and eggs.
I'm oblivious to the billions of animals mass slaughtered each and every year, just so I can enjoy my steak, bacon and eggs.
Vegans are so judgemental. Forcing their beliefs on everyone. Why would I want to be a compassionate human, when I can continue eating dead animal flesh daily?
The cow was already dead. Might as well eat it! I know, I know...if the buying stops, the killing will too. But logic doesn't work on me.
The words 'leather' and 'fur' are much more comfortable to say than 'dead animal skin'.
Vegans aren't strong. They don't eat enough protein.
Plants have feelings too.
I don't want to eat salad forever! Death tastes better.
Be a man. Eat meat. Disregard the fact that I'm a grown man still drinking milk from a mother cow!
Vegans should just shut the hell up. OK, I admit I'm eating dead animals and don't give a fuck. There, I said it.
